
# Semantic API

#### Versions

|:--- |:--- |:--- |

| query  | ✅ | complete |
| typelib |   ❌  | in-process |
| type tools | ❌ | in-process |
| database tools | ❌ | in-process |
| chain tools  | ❌ | in-process |
